ru.rsreu.serovtorzhkova0108.datalayer.data.course

Class Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.rsreu.serovtorzhkova0108.datalayer.data.course.Lesson

  • public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
    A class is an entity of the lesson with date, list of absent students and list of grades for the lesson
    Author:
    Serov and Torzhkova
